[[File:Windows To Go USB Flash Drive.png|thumb|One of the [[Windows To Go]] USB flash drives offered by Microsoft at the BUILD conference|link=Windows To Go]]
{{Main|Features new to Windows 8}}
{{Main|Features new to Windows 8}}
Features expected to be introduced in Windows 8 include [[USB 3.0]] support (from a standard install disc), a [[Ribbon (computing)|ribbon interface]] in [[Windows Explorer]], the [[Windows Store]], the [[Protogon]] Filesystem, [[Windows To Go]], among others.
